nydailynews.title: Tipster recounts what made RV look sketchy in sex abuse case
nydailynews.topComment: He is a hero. We need more people like him. If your instincts tell you something is wrong, then something is wrong. ALWAYS go with your instincts.

nydailynews.title: Swinger magazine inspired woman to sleep with 3,000 men
nydailynews.topComment: Is that something you are supposed to be proud of???

nydailynews.title: David Carr had aggressive lung cancer, heart disease
nydailynews.topComment: If you read his book the guy was lucky to reach 35.  The residue of  wife beating, child abusing massive drug abuser of the past simply returned to find him.  The polished impressive confines of The Times newsroom was not about to save him though it ...
